pr_title: Catch runtime exception in generated map folder deletion

timeline.message: Catch runtime exception in generated map folder deletion

replies.bodyText:
We could I just followed how it handled not being able to list the custom maps directory.
The only real reason to inform I think would be so that they could delete it themselves if they wanted to but not sure if necessary or depending on how often it happens might just be annoying.
